0.title: MYTHOLOGY
clues: Some say this woman of Troy married Paris' brother Deiphobus after Paris' death

This wife of Jupiter was considered the queen of heaven

2.title: CALIFORNIA CITIES

8.title: AMERICAN LITERATURE
